root.name: Wayne's World
root.description: Long Before Mike Myers bore the monikor of Austin Power his most famous role was that of Wayne Campbell, the titular character of Wayne's World, a rock aficionado and co host of a fictional Illinois-based cable access television show Wayne's World. Originally a Saturday Night Live Sketch later becoming subject of 2 films. In this Capstone Software Point and Click adventure, Wayne and his sidekick Garth want to hold a Pizza-thon to raise money for their cable show.
